Control.Name: fgCheck
Control.Tooltip: Check this to display foreground effects.

Control.Name: fgComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The foreground effects to display.

Control.Name: fgEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the selected foreground effects.

Control.Name: bgCheck
Control.Tooltip: Check this to display background effects.

Control.Name: bgComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The background effects to display.

Control.Name: bgEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the selected background effects.

Control.Name: stCheck
Control.Tooltip: Check this to display a static profile.

Control.Name: stComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The static lighting profile to display.

Control.Name: stEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the selected static profile.

Control.Name: UpdateButton
Control.Tooltip: Update to the latest version.

Control.Name: LogButton
Control.Tooltip: Display the Log and Log Settings. (Click twice for Settings)

Control.Name: SettingsButton
Control.Tooltip: Display the Settings page.

Control.Name: LogVerbosityLabel
Control.Tooltip: Verbosity of the log output.

Control.Name: LogVerbosityComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Verbosity of the log output.

Control.Name: CheckMinimizeToTray
Control.Tooltip: Minimize to the System Tray instead of the Task Bar.

Control.Name: CheckStartWithWindows
Control.Tooltip: Start CEE when Windows starts.

Control.Name: CheckStartMinimized
Control.Tooltip: Start CEE in a minimized state.

Control.Name: Check16MColours
Control.Tooltip: Run the keyboard in 16.8 million colour mode.

Control.Name: CheckDisplayLiveKeyboardPreview
Control.Tooltip: Show effects and animations on the Keyboard page as they're being rendered.

Control.Name: CheckWarnIfCueIsOpen
Control.Text: Display a warning if CUE is open
Control.Tooltip: Show a warning before starting effects if CUE is running.

Control.Name: CheckLaunchCueOnExit
Control.Tooltip: "Launch CUE upon quitting CEE. This requires the path to CUE to be entered below.

Control.Name: CheckRestoreLightingOnExit
Control.Tooltip: Restore on-device lighting to the keyboard and mouse when quitting.

Control.Name: CUEPathLabel
Control.Text: Corsair Utility Engine (CUE) Path. Double click to browse.
Control.Tooltip: Double click in the TextBox below to open the Browse dialog.

Control.Name: CuePathTextBox
Control.Tooltip: Navigate to the path of your CUE executable. This is used to launch CUE when quitting CEE.

Control.Name: CheckInvertM1
Control.Tooltip: Invert the colour of the M1 key on the K95. When selected, it acts as a negative to what's sent to it, so this compensates.

Control.Name: ProgramAccentColorLabel
Control.Tooltip: Select the coloured box to choose an accent colour for CEE.

Control.Name: DonateButton
Control.Tooltip: Make a donation to support the development and web-hosting of Corsair Effects Engine.

Control.Name: UseSdkCheckBox
Control.Tooltip: Use the CUE SDK instead of direct hardware control.

Control.Name: KeyboardModelLabel
Control.Tooltip: Select the keyboard you wish to use.

Control.Name: KeyboardModelComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Select the keyboard you wish to use.

Control.Name: KeyboardLayoutLabel
Control.Tooltip: Select the region of your keyboard.

Control.Name: KeyboardLayoutComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Select the region of your keyboard.

Control.Name: MouseModelLabel
Control.Tooltip: Select the mouse you would like to use.

Control.Name: MouseModelComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Select the mouse you would like to use.

Control.Name: AudioOutputDeviceRadioButton
Control.Tooltip: Capture audio from an output device, such as your speakers or headphones.

Control.Name: UseDefaultOutputDevice
Control.Tooltip: Automatically select an output device based on the default device in Windows.

Control.Name: AudioOutputDeviceComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Select an output device to capture from.

Control.Name: AudioInputDeviceRadioButton
Control.Tooltip: Capture audio from an input device, such as a mic or line-in.

Control.Name: UseDefaultInputDevice
Control.Tooltip: Automatically select an input device based on the default device in Windows.

Control.Name: AudioInputDeviceComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Select an input device to capture from.

Control.Name: FramesPerSecondLabel
Control.Tooltip: Maximum amount of frames to render and send to devices each second.

Control.Name: FramesPerSecondIntegerUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Maximum amount of frames to render and send to devices each second.

Control.Name: ApplySpectroChangesButton
Control.Tooltip: If something went wrong when changing hardware, re-initialize everything.

Control.Name: PageBeingEditedDoneButton
Control.Tooltip: Save changes made on this page and return to the main page.

Control.Name: AcceptColourButton
Control.Tooltip: Accept and apply changes.

Control.Name: CancelColourButton
Control.Tooltip: Cancel and lose changes.

Control.Name: fgSpectroStyleLabel
Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Name: fgSpectroStyleComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Name: fgSpectroRainbowDirectionLabel
Control.Tooltip: The direction that the rainbow will travel.

Control.Name: fgSpectroRainbowDirection
Control.Tooltip: The direction that the rainbow will travel.

Control.Name: fgSpectroCycleLabel
Control.Tooltip: Time in milliseconds for the effect to last before repeating. This is synced with Background effects.

Control.Name: fgSpectroCycleUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Time in milliseconds for the effect to last before repeating. This is synced with Background effects.

Control.Name: fftRainbowBrightnessLabel
Control.Tooltip: Brightness of lights on a scale of 0 to 255.

Control.Name: fftRainbowBrightnessUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Brightness of lights on a scale of 0 to 255.

Control.Name: fftSizeLabel
Control.Tooltip: The amount of samples to include in one frame. The higher this is, the more accurate but slower the display is. Default is 1024.

Control.Name: fftSizeComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The amount of samples to include in one frame. The higher this is, the more accurate but slower the display is. Default is 1024.

Control.Name: fftBinsPerPointLabel
Control.Tooltip: Amount of samples per point of data. Higher numbers lead to more rounded corners. Default is 2.

Control.Name: fftBinsPerPointComboBox
Control.Tooltip: Amount of samples per point of data. Higher numbers lead to more rounded corners. Default is 2.

Control.Name: fftDecibelRangeLabel
Control.Tooltip: Range of loudness to pick up.

Control.Name: fftDbMinUpDown
Control.Tooltip: The minimum loudness to respond to. The closer to 0, the louder a sound.

Control.Name: fftDbMaxUpDown
Control.Tooltip: The maximum loudness to respond to. The closer to 0, the louder a sound.

Control.Name: fftFrequenciesLabel
Control.Tooltip: Range of frequencies to pick up.

Control.Name: fftFreqMinUpDown
Control.Tooltip: The lowest frequencies to respond to. These are on the furthest point left of the keyboard.

Control.Name: fftFreqMaxUpDown
Control.Tooltip: The highest frequencies to respond to. These are on the furthest point right of the keyboard.

Control.Name: fftWindowLabel
Control.Tooltip: The Windowing function used to shape the data. This will change the appearance of the spectro slightly.

Control.Name: fftWindowComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The Windowing function used to shape the data. This will change the appearance of the spectro slightly.

Control.Name: fftLogVolumeCheckBox
Control.Tooltip: Show loudness along the height of the keyboard on a logarithmic or linear scale.

Control.Name: fftLogFrequenciesCheckBox
Control.Tooltip: Space frequencies along the length of the keyboard on a logarithmic or linear scale.

Control.Name: fftFreqBoostUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Gain this many dB at the furthest right of the spectrum. [Default is 10]

Control.Name: fftFreqBoostCheckBox
Control.Tooltip: Creates a slope that gradually increases amplification towards the right side of the keyboard.

Control.Name: fftEffectsOnMouseCheckBox
Control.Tooltip: Show beat analyzer effects on the Mouse. [Not Yet Implemented]

Control.Name: fftRow7Label
Control.Tooltip: Colour of the top row. This is the row with the Corsair logo, M-keys, WinLock, and Brightness keys.

Control.Name: fftRow6Label
Control.Tooltip: Colour of the row including the Escape key and Function keys.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsStyleLabel
Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsStyle
Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsSolidDurationUD
Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before switching.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsSolidDurationLabel
Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before switching.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsFadeSolidDurationUD
Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before beginning to fade.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsFadeSolidDurationLabel
Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before beginning to fade.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsFadeTotalDurationUD
Control.Tooltip: Total duration in milliseconds of one cycle of the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsFadeTotalDurationLabel
Control.Tooltip: Total duration in milliseconds of one cycle of the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsStartTypeLabel
Control.Tooltip: The colour to start the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsStartTypeComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The colour to start the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsStartColorEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the Start Colour.

Control.Tooltip: The colour to end the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsEndTypeComboBox
Control.Tooltip: The colour to end the effect.

Control.Name: fgRandomLightsEndColorEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the End Colour.

Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Tooltip: The style of light to be used for this effect.

Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before switching.

Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before switching.

Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before beginning to fade.

Control.Tooltip: Time to remain solid in milliseconds before beginning to fade.

Control.Tooltip: Total duration in milliseconds of one cycle of the effect.

Control.Tooltip: The colour to end the effect.

Control.Name: fgReactiveEndColorEditButton
Control.Tooltip: Edit the End Colour.

Control.Name: fgHeatmapColorMostLabel
Control.Tooltip: The colour to shade the keys you have struck most.

Control.Name: fgHeatmapColorLeastLabel
Control.Tooltip: The colour to shade the keys you have struck least.

Control.Name: fgHeatmapResetCountButton
Control.Tooltip: Reset counters to zero.

Control.Name: fgCpuLabel
Control.Tooltip: Colour of the CPU Usage Bar.

Control.Name: fgCpuRefreshLabel
Control.Tooltip: Refresh every x milliseconds.

Control.Tooltip: Refresh every x milliseconds.

Control.Name: fgCpuBarDirectionLabel
Control.Tooltip: Direction to grow the bar.

Control.Tooltip: Direction to grow the bar.

Control.Name: bgSolidLabel
Control.Tooltip: Colour of the solid background.

Control.Name: bgBreatheDurationLabel
Control.Tooltip: Duration in milliseconds of each step of the effect.

Control.Name: bgBreatheStepOneLabel
Control.Tooltip: The first step of the effect.

Control.Name: bgBreatheStepOneUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Duration for the first step to remain solid before beginning to transition to the next.

Control.Name: bgBreatheTransitionLabel
Control.Tooltip: The transition between the steps of the effect.

Control.Name: bgBreatheTransitionUpDown
Control.Tooltip: The duration of the transition from one step to another

Control.Name: bgBreatheStepTwoLabel
Control.Tooltip: The second step of the effect.

Control.Name: bgBreatheStepTwoUpDown
Control.Tooltip: Duration for the second step to remain solid before beginning to transition to the next.

Control.Name: bgRainbowCycleTimeLabel
Control.Tooltip: Time in milliseconds before the effect repeats.

Control.Tooltip: Time in milliseconds before the effect repeats.

Control.Tooltip: Brightness of the background effect.
